Structure for Projects¶

For projects:

project:
  name: Super Server
  customer: Mario
  ssh-server:
    - host: 10.0.0.11
      name: Pre-Production
      user: dd
      port: 22
    - host: 10.0.0.12
      name: Production
      user: dd
      port: 22
  repo:
    url: http://github/odoogap/proj1
    tag: v10.20
  comments: >
    This project lorem ipsum lorem
    lorem ipsum lorem lorem ipsum lorem
    lorem ipsum lorem lorem ipsum lorem
